thread.title: Ground News - Analyst Compares WR Prospect To 2 NFL Star WRs
thread.title_full: Ground News - Analyst Compares WR Prospect To 2 NFL Star WRs

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Analyst Compares WR Prospect To 2 NFL Star WRs
text:
Summary by Ground News Ricky Pearsall could be a top-45 pick if teams have a similar read on him, putting him near the top of the second round. The wide receiver could still be the seventh or eighth receiver off the board, but it is still high capital, an indication that the team that selects him would likely call upon him. The Cold Wire Analyst Compares WR Prospect To 2 NFL Star WRs (Photo by David Becker/Getty Images) Now that the initial craziness of the NFL’s free agency period has passed, fans and analysts have turned most of their attention to the NFL Draft. This year’s draft is filled with several blue-chip prospects, players who are expected to make an immediate impact when they get to the league.
